  "question": "Three inhabitants, X, Y, and Z, make statements: X says, 'Y is a liar.' Y says, 'Z is a truth-teller.' Z says, 'X and Y are of the same type.' If exactly two are liars, who is the truth-teller?",
  "choices": ["A) X", "B) Y", "C) Z", "D) None"],
